attributes.action: Stop using the term 'Green Taxes' as an excuse to increase taxes unnecessarily
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new so called 'Green Taxes' announced today will have virtually no impact on global warming in my opinion, and are being used as an excuse to raise taxes yet again. Where are the details of where this tax will be spent? Will it be spent on more buses, Park-N-Ride schemes or lower train fairs? I think not, so where is the benefit to the environment? Please stop this meddling and do something worthwhile rather than hijacking every opportunity to increase taxes.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop using the term 'Green Taxes' as an excuse to increase taxes unnecessarily."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10959.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/GreenTaxMyth/
